name: Volatile light
description:
This game is about a toy, who is struggling to feel alive...It is also about a friendship, and betrayal. About lost and found. About an energy....or, mostly, the lack of it. An owl named Elizabeth is willing to find her owner - girl Emili, by helping the ghosts on her way. Try this marvelous adventure by yourself. But be hurry...your batteries are almost out!

Installation Instructions: 

Windows version: Just unzip and run "NVolatile light.exe" in Build Win directory.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement;
  • Space -  Jump;
  • Light - F;
  • Use - E;
  • Ecs - Pause, Exit

Tools And Technologies: UE4, Photoshop, Maya, Marvelous Designer

Credits: 

  • Project Manager:  Varvara Vetrova
  • Programmer:  Pavel Vetrov
  • Game design:  Ruslan Roslovtsev, Mara Hmara
  • Level design:  Dmitry Zhigulsky
  • UI\UX: Varvara Vetrova 
  • 3d-art/Texture:  Konstantin Vasiliev
  • Music and SFX:  Larry Wzrd- @lizardtheprince
